      • ruleOf72

        public float ruleOf72​(float r)
        This function calculates the approximate number of years required to double the money over the given Compound interest rate.
        Parameters:
        r - Is a compound rate of interest that can be any real number between 1 to 100.
        Returns:
        a float value of approximate years.
